comments:
Connection profiles fail to load at startup.  Sometimes on startup, no connection profiles are listed in the DSE.  The following exception was found in the log:

Brian, could you take a look at this when you get a chance.

I noted this after the recent changes to connectivity as well. If the connection profiles are re-created using the new code line, then it doesn't seem to happen.

Probably good to check anyway.  :-)
John came up with a good suggestion to generate a new DocumentBuilder if we get the first error. Then if we get it again with the second builder, we know we have problems. Have delivered the change.

Brian,

This actually looks like a synchronization issue; two threads trying to use the same parser.  I haven't had a chance to look at your solution, but we might consider creating a parser specifically for the CP loader and synchronizing it properly.  I haven't done any checking to see where we're getting the parser from and who else might be using it.

Rob
